verses.text: 大利烏王第二年六月一日，耶和華的話藉著哈該先知臨到撒拉鐵的兒子、猶大省長所羅巴伯，和約撒答的兒子大祭司約書亞，說：

words.note: The personal name of God in the Old Testament.
Lit. 'one who knows beforehand'.

verses.heading: Introduction

verses.text: 「萬軍之耶和華這樣說：『這民說，重建耶和華殿宇的時候還沒有到。』」

words.note: A divine title emphasizing God's sovereignty over all creation.
A formal term for a grand building, often a temple.

verses.heading: The Indifference of the People

verses.text: 於是，耶和華的話臨到哈該先知說：
「這殿宇仍然荒廢，豈是你們住在有天花板的房屋的時候嗎？」

words.note: Used to form rhetorical questions, implying the opposite.

verses.text: 現在萬軍之耶和華這樣說：「你們要反省自己的行為。
你們撒的種多，收割的卻少；你們吃，卻吃不飽；你們喝，卻喝不足；你們穿衣服，卻穿不暖；得工錢的，卻把工錢放在破袋裡。」

words.note: Verb-complement construction: 'eat not full'.
Verb-complement construction: 'drink not enough'.
Verb-complement construction: 'wear not warm'.
Marks a preceding phrase as a noun, e.g., 'those who get wages'.
Used to bring the object before the verb.

verses.text: 萬軍之耶和華這樣說：「你們要反省自己的行為。

words.note: A title for God meaning 'LORD of armies' or 'LORD Almighty'.

verses.heading: The Instruction of the People

verses.text: 你們要上山取木材，建造殿宇；我必因此喜悅，並且得榮耀。」耶和華說：

words.note: Often refers to the Temple of Jerusalem in biblical context.

verses.text: 「你們期望豐收，反倒歉收；你們收到家裡的，我就吹去。」為甚麼呢？萬軍之耶和華說：「因為我的殿宇荒廢，你們各人卻為自己的房屋奔馳。

words.note: Forms a noun phrase from the preceding descriptive clause.
A title for God meaning 'LORD of armies' or 'LORD Almighty'.
Often refers to the Temple of Jerusalem in biblical context.

verses.text: 所以，因你們的緣故，天就不降甘露，地也不出土產。

words.note: Figuratively, divine favor or blessing.

verses.text: 我叫乾旱臨到大地、群山、五穀、新酒、新油、地上的出產、人畜和人手勞碌得來的一切。」

words.note: Often used for events happening to people or places.
Refers to various staple grains.

verses.text: 那時，撒拉鐵的兒子所羅巴伯、約撒答的兒子大祭司約書亞和所有餘剩的子民，都聽從了耶和華他們 神的話，聽從了耶和華他們 神所差來的哈該先知的話。眾民在耶和華面前都存著敬畏的心。

words.note: Refers to a specific group of people under authority, often God's people.
The Hebrew name for God.
Refers to the unique God; often capitalized in English.
Used to nominalize a verb or verb phrase.
Lit. 'one who knows beforehand'.
Implies respectful awe or fear of a higher power.

verses.heading: The Response of the People

verses.text: 耶和華的使者哈該，奉耶和華的命，對眾民說：「耶和華說：『我與你們同在。』」

words.definition: by order of, in compliance with
words.note: Classical Chinese usage, often 'receive (an order)'.

verses.text: 於是耶和華激發了撒拉鐵的兒子、猶大省長所羅巴伯的心，和約撒答的兒子大祭司約書亞的心，以及所有餘剩子民的心，他們就來興工建造萬軍之耶和華他們 神的殿宇。

words.note: Often found in historical or formal contexts for beginning large projects.
A fixed phrase, part of the title 'Lord of Hosts'.
Often specifically refers to a temple or grand building.

verses.text: 那時是大利烏王第二年六月二十四日。
